text: Jonathan Bartley (born 16 October 1971 in London) is an English politician who was co-leader of the Green Party of England and Wales with the MP Caroline Lucas and later with Si√¢n Berry until stepping down from the party's leadership in July 2021. He was a councillor on the Lambeth London Borough Council and leader of the opposition on the council until May 2022. == References == Category:1971 births Category:Leaders of political parties in the United Kingdom Category:Politicians from London Category:Columnists Category:English Christian writers Category:Living people Category:Green Party of England and Wales people
title: Jonathan Bartley
